behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink)

            if (surfaces(item) or grabbable(item)) and on(item, sink):
                achieve_once inhand(item)

def needs_cleaning(sink:item):
    # Check if there are any dirty areas on the sink
    symbol dirty_area=exists part: item : dirty(part) and on(part, sink)
    return dirty_area

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink)
        # Select any sink for assessment

        if not visited(sink):
            observe(sink, "Assess the condition of the bathroom sink to identify dirty areas")
            # Observe the sink to identify areas that need cleaning
        
        if needs_cleaning(sink):
            achieve visited(sink)
            # Mark the sink as visited once dirty areas are identified

Goal Representation:
Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Clean the bathroom sink surface.']

behavior clean_sink_surface(sink:item, detergent:item):
    body:
        observe(sink,"Check the surface condition and if theres anything on it")
        # Observe to gather necessary details about the sink surface

        achieve clean(sink)
        # Ensure the sink surface is clean

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink) and id[sink]==42
        # Select sink with ID 42

        bind detergent: item where:
            is_detergent(detergent) and on(detergent, sink)
        # Select detergent found on the sink

        clean_sink_surface(sink, detergent)
